questions.questionname: Which of the following statements regarding WebSockets is true?
questions.1: It communicates with the server with only the data required by the application.
questions.2: It lowers the latency of connections for interactive web applications.
questions.3: It scales better and consumes less server resources than HTTP AJAX/long-poll.

questions.questionname: Assuming that some text needs to be written on an HTML5 canvas, select a replacement for the commented line below:
questions.questionoptions: <canvas id='e' width='200' height='200'></canvas> <script> var canvas = document.getElementById(“e'); context.fillStyle = “blue';   context.font = “bold 16px Arial';   context.fillText(“Zibri', 100, 100); </script>

questions.questionname: What is the role of the <dfn> element in HTML5?
questions.1: It is used to define important text
questions.2: It is used to define computer code text.
questions.3: It is used to define sample computer code.
questions.4: It is used to define a definition term.
